definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: A vaccine prepared from the cowpox virus and inoculated against smallpox.
sentences.chinese: 牛痘苗從牛痘毒素提取的用來預防天花的疫苗。

sentences.english: A vaccine prepared from the cowpox virus and inoculated against smallpox.
sentences.chinese: 牛痘苗從牛痘毒素提取的用來預防天花的疫苗。

sentences.english: I'm immune to smallpox as a result of vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 我種過牛痘了，所以對天花有免疫力。
種了一次牛痘，起預防作用。

sentences.english: My child was vaccinated against smallpox.
sentences.chinese: 我的小孩種了牛痘以防天花。

sentences.english: The smallpox vaccine is a completely new product that will be added to the Strategic National Stockpile.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種全新的牛痘疫苗，將加入戰略性國家貯備。

sentences.english: The children were all vaccinated against smallpox.
sentences.chinese: 所有兒童都種了牛痘以預防天花。

sentences.english: The discovery of a vaccine was the turning point in the fight against smallpox.
sentences.chinese: 牛痘苗的發現是根治天花的關鍵。

sentences.english: The kids went to the hospital to be inoculated.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們到醫院去種牛痘去了。

sentences.english: Smallpox can be contained by vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 種牛痘疫苗可以控制住天花。

sentences.english: Smallpox have is bring under control by the use of vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 通過種牛痘天花已得到控制。

sentences.english: We are immune to smallpox as a result of vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 由於種了牛痘我們對天花有免疫力。
接種牛痘能使人免患天花。

sentences.english: She is vaccinate against smallpox as a child.
sentences.chinese: 我的小孩種了牛痘以防天花。
種牛痘防天花是有效的。

definition: epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
